attributes.action: Create a new, para-military Border Police Force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A governments first duty is to protect it's citizens. It cannot do that if it's borders are not secure - as was proved by the events in London and Glasgow.

The police are over stretched. We need a new, paramilitary Border Police Force to act as our first line of defence.

Because next time we might not be so lucky...
